title: The teashop empire
itunes:title: The teashop empire
itunes:subtitle: Thomas Harding describes how a family of Jewish immigrants to Britain in the 19th century created one of the country’s best-known food companies. Historyextra.com/podcast
description:
Author and journalist Thomas Harding describes how a family of Jewish immigrants to Britain in the 19th century went on to create Lyons – one of the country’s best-known food and restaurant companies. Historyextra.com/podcast

Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
